title: Constructivist Approach to Mental Health Understanding and Practice Project

context.additional_context: Blended learning environment incorporating group activity spaces and digital devices (tablets/laptops) to strengthen collaborative learning

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain at least three social factors causing mental health issues
Learners design and present community mental health improvement plans through collaborative problem-solving processes
Learners practice monitoring individual and group mental health statuses using digital tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
